reviewText: I always like knit-alongs and this one is no exception.  Raga is precise and cheerful and her tips are invaluable

Wonderful DVD, love to watch the process of the wool.

Wishing the DVD had more knitting on it and different patterns.

I just finished knitting three of these sweaters - one for Papa, and 2 for each of our grandsons - for Christmas.  I referred to this DVD often.  I did order Icelandic wool yarn for authenticity and they turned out beautiful.  Thank you so much for this resource - the DVD was immensely helpful to my project...
